pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw:
Sadly it *is* needed (at least, based on all the macro-writing strategy guides I could find). The problem boils down to the syntax required by the preprocessor to apply the stringification correctly to the substituted tokens.

Basically, if we tried to take the `_HELPER_2` functions out of the implementation, we'd end up producing something like

`_Pragma("clang diagnostic ignored IGN_COMMON_DELETE_NON_VIRTUAL_DESTRUCTOR")`

instead of what we really want

`_Pragma("clang diagnostic ignored -Wdelete-non-virtual-dtor")`
